channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘The Beast In Me’ Dethroned In Netflix’s Top Ten List By A New Show
item.description: Here's what new show has knocked The Beast in Me off the #1 spot in Netflix's top 10 list.

item.description: Not sure what today's NYT Connections answers are all about? Find out just what the different words in today's grid mean and how they fit together.

item.title: Hackers Bypass Signal, Telegram And WhatsApp Encryption To Read Messages
item.description: How private and secure are your end-to-end encrypted instant messages? Not so much when Sturnus attacks.

item.title: Infantilization
item.description: The worst sort of powerlessness happens when we’re seduced into doing it to ourselves.
